requestText: A dog running in a field.
videoScript:
Title: "Dog Running in a Field"

Introduction (1-2 sentences): In this video, we will demonstrate how to create a simple animation using the Unity game engine. We will use the Unreal Engine for a more complex project.

Key Points (3-4 sentences each):
- Unity is an open-source game engine that can be used for creating 2D and 3D games.
- The Unreal Engine is a powerful tool for creating realistic 3D environments and characters.
